department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Adaptive Radiation and Macroevolution
course.description: A critical examination of the concepts and methods related to the study of adaptive radiation and macroevolutionary diversification. Evolutionary consequences will be studied from both empirical and theoretical perspectives. Emphasis will be placed on current controversies on applying modern conceptual and analytical approaches to long-standing questions.
